headers.value: Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' https:; connect-src 'self' https:; frame-src 'self' https:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
